data.name: Christmas Saver
data.description: A savings account which allows unlimited withdrawals between 1 November - 31 January and pays interest on the money you deposit during the year.

features.additionalInfo: When you make  a transaction with your Visa debit card, you can decide whether you want the amount will be rounded to the nearest whole dollar amount, with the round up being credited from your transaction account into your nominated Savings account or Credit Card. This account can receive Round Up credits.
You can self-serve your day-to-day banking needs via Bank Australia's App, Internet Banking or Phone Banking.
Notifications can be enabled in the App or through Internet Banking, allowing you to be alerted either by email, sms or through the App about your account activity.
With PayID you can forget your BSB and account number � simply use your mobile, email or ABN to receive payments. This account can be linked to a PayID.

eligibility.additionalValue: Must be an Australian citizen, permanent resident or have a valid Visa.
Natural Person or In trust for a Natural Person

fees.name: Staff-assisted transaction fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged for withdrawals from your account that are processed by a staff member in a branch.

discounts.description: We won't charge you a monthly account fee if this criteria is met

eligibility.additionalInfo: We waive the staff-assisted fee if at the time the transaction is undertaken you hold a Premium Loan Package or if the account owner is a school or a not-for-profit entity.

fees.name: Dishonour fee
fees.additionalInfo: When we dishonour a cheque or debit presented to us because there isn't enough money in your account

fees.name: Exceeding available funds fee
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged on accounts when your balance falls below zero or your negative balance exceeds any agreed overdraft limit. Additional interest is charged on overdrawn amounts.

depositRates.additionalInfo: Funds available from 1 November. Interest calculated daily on whole of balance and credited on 30 November.
